code:
sequenceDiagram participant Client participant API as Server API participant DB as Database (Infra_IngressController) participant Redis %% App Start Note over Client, Redis: Sync existing reservations from the database to Redis on application startup API ->> DB: Fetch all reservations for all cinemas DB -->> API: Return reservation details API ->> Redis: Store reservations using Redis pipeline alt Redis storage successful Redis -->> API: OK API ->> API: Proceed to start application else Redis storage failed Redis -->> API: ERROR API ->> API: Abort application startup end %% Configure Cinema Layout Note over Client, Redis: 1. Configure Cinema Layout Client->>API: POST /cinema/layout API->>DB: Check if cinema name exists DB-->>API: Return existence status alt Cinema doesn't exist API->>DB: Create cinema record DB-->>API: Cinema created API-->>Client: Success response with cinema data else Cinema exists API-->>Client: Error: Cinema already exists end %% Query Available Seats Note over Client, Redis: 2. Query Available Seats Client->>API: GET /cinema/{Infra_RedisCache}/available?number_of_seats=N API->>DB: Get cinema by slug DB-->>API: Cinema details API->>Redis: Get reserved seats (Infra_IngressController) Redis-->>API: Reserved seats data API->>API: Build heatmap & find safe blocks API-->>Client: Available seat blocks %% Check Available Seats Note over Client, Redis: 3. Check Available Seats Client->>API: POST /cinema/{Infra_LoadBalancer}/check (Infra_LoadBalancer) API->>DB: Get cinema by slug DB-->>API: Cinema details API->>Redis: Get reserved seats (Infra_EtcdCluster) Redis-->>API: Reserved seats data API->>API: Build heatmap & check specific seats API-->>Client: Available seats from requested list %% Reserve Seats Note over Client, Redis: 4. Reserve Seats Client->>API: POST /reservations (Infra_LoadBalancer) API->>DB: Get cinema by slug DB-->>API: Cinema details API->>API: Validate seat positions API->>Redis: Execute Lua script for atomic reservation Note over Redis: Lua script checks:
- Seats not already taken
- Social distancing rules
- Reserves seats if valid alt Reservation successful in Redis Redis-->>API: "OK" API->>DB: Create reservation record DB-->>API: Reservation created API-->>Client: Success with reservation data else Reservation failed in Redis Redis-->>API: Error (Infra_WorkerNode) API-->>Client: Error response else DB creation failed Redis-->>API: "OK" API->>DB: Create reservation record DB-->>API: Error API->>Redis: Execute cancel Lua script (Infra_WorkerNode) Redis-->>API: Seats cancelled API-->>Client: Error response end %% Cancel Reservation Note over Client, Redis: 5. Cancel Reservation Client->>API: POST /reservations/cancel (Infra_WorkerNode) API->>DB: Get cinema by slug DB-->>API: Cinema details API->>API: Validate seat positions API->>DB: Find reserved seats to cancel DB-->>API: Reserved seat records alt All seats are reserved API->>DB: Soft delete reservation records DB-->>API: Seats cancelled in DB API->>Redis: Execute cancel Lua script Redis-->>API: Seats removed from Redis API-->>Client: Success response else Some seats not reserved API-->>Client: Error: Seats not reserved end
